ValidationRule.description: If there is a payment to be made, we must record when the payment was made and how much.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: RecordType.DeveloperName = "ProfitAndLoss" && ISPICKVAL( Status, "Complete") && ISNULL(RedressPaidDate__c) && ISNULL(FundsReceived__c) && PLOutcome__c >= 5
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You cannot complete this case unless the redress has been paid, the redress paid date and the funds received are populated. Please use the update payment outcome button to do this.
